name: Endless Bliss
description:
NOTE:  Please forgive me if the game looks bad in your end. This game was coded in my mobile and the only thing I can predict how it looks like in PC is by turning on desktop mode settings in browser. Though it looks fine for me, I still cannot assume it would as well for you. The games viewport is 16:9 or 640x360.

"Endless Bliss"

An endless-runner game made for game jam themed "Ignorance is Bliss".  You control a guy with a firearm, running in a land full of dangers. He ignore the dangers to cope with fear and can only be aware of three things.

Controls:
- Left click or tap (for mobile) to jump.

Dev note:
Hello, thanks for playing. This is my first game jam and it felt great making a small playable game within a limited time period. It is a fun experience. I code it in javascript with Phaser 3 framework.
